knotfreeiot

Massively Scalable Distributed Open Source Non Profit Name Server and IOT Backend with JWT to Control Access and Monetize.

View project on GitHub

key utils

This is what the username and password for a ‘thing’ looks like. As a person I use a password manager, like LastPass, to keep track.

No private keys are transmitted ever from these pages. All calculations are done locally.

The username you can give out to anyone. The password you should keep a secret. Note. This ‘key pair’ can also be use as a Libra account.
